tables.name: fastcdn_admin
tables.definition:
CREATE TABLE `fastcdn_admin` (
  `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID',
  `is_on` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否启用',
  `username` varchar(64)  DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '用户名',
  `password` varchar(32)  DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '密码',
  `fullname` varchar(64)  DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '全名',
  `is_super` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否为超级管理员',
  `created_at` bigint unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `updated_at` bigint unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间',
  `state` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  `modules` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '允许的模块',
  `can_login` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否可以登录',
  `theme` varchar(64)  DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '模板设置',
  `lang` varchar(64)  DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '语言代号',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `username` (`username`) USING BTREE,
  KEY `password` (`password`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='管理员'

fields.name: is_on
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否启用'

fields.name: is_super
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否为超级管理员'

fields.name: can_login
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否可以登录'

fields.name: created_at
fields.definition: bigint(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间'

fields.name: updated_at
fields.definition: bigint(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间'

tables.name: fastcdn_api_tokens
tables.definition:
CREATE TABLE `fastcdn_api_tokens` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID',
  `node_id` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '节点ID',
  `secret` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '节点密钥',
  `role` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '节点角色',
  `state` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `node_id` (`node_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='API令牌管理'

tables.name: fastcdn_api_nodes
tables.definition:
CREATE TABLE `fastcdn_api_nodes` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID',
  `is_on` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否启用',
  `cluster_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '专用集群ID',
  `unique_id` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '唯一ID',
  `secret` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '密钥',
  `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '名称',
  `description` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '描述',
  `http` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '监听的HTTP配置',
  `https` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '监听的HTTPS配置',
  `rest_is_on` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否开放REST',
  `rest_http` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'REST HTTP配置',
  `rest_https` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'REST HTTPS配置',
  `access_addrs` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '外部访问地址',
  `order` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `state` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  `created_at` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `admin_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '管理员ID',
  `weight` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '权重',
  `status` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '运行状态',
  `is_primary` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否为主API节点',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_id` (`unique_id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='API节点'

fields.name: is_on
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否启用'

fields.name: cluster_id
fields.definition: bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '专用集群ID'

fields.name: rest_is_on
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否开放REST'

fields.name: created_at
fields.definition: int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间'

fields.name: is_primary
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否为主API节点'

tables.name: fastcdn_ip_lists
tables.definition:
CREATE TABLE `fastcdn_ip_lists` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID',
  `is_on` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否启用',
  `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '类型',
  `admin_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `server_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '服务ID',
  `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '列表名',
  `code` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '代号',
  `state` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  `created_at` bigint(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `timeout` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '默认超时时间',
  `actions` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'IP触发的动作',
  `description` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '描述',
  `is_public` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否公用',
  `is_global` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否全局',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `type` (`type`),
  KEY `server_id` (`server_id`),
  KEY `code` (`code`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='IP名单'

fields.name: is_on
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否启用'

fields.name: created_at
fields.definition: int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间'

fields.name: is_public
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否公用'

fields.name: is_global
fields.definition: tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否全局'
